channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report X-2023090676
item.description:
Report X-2023090676

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-17T15:12:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-11
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Damaged hazmat was brought to QA by package handler. Upon inspection found the contents were leaking from containers. damaged hazmat was placed in a hazmat bag and drum. DescribePack: Further inspection of package found caps were loose and package appeared to be improperly loaded. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: After the damaged hazmat was discovered, it was placed in hazmat bag and drum.
